languages.text:
Wielder gain + {uip|Temp Wounds|d30eeebc490b4fdc8c26be44ffa1bf6a} Temporary Wounds and doesn't provoke Attacks of Opportunity until the end of their turn on Perils of the Warp trigger.
Whenever Perils of the Warp are triggered, they always summon Daemons

traits.locale_text:
Wielder gain + {uip|Temp Wounds|d30eeebc490b4fdc8c26be44ffa1bf6a} Temporary Wounds and doesn't provoke Attacks of Opportunity until the end of their turn on Perils of the Warp trigger.
Whenever Perils of the Warp are triggered, they always summon Daemons

languages.text: Whenever the wearer triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}, they gain +{uip|Temp Wounds|d30eeebc490b4fdc8c26be44ffa1bf6a} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} and do not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Whenever perils of the warp is triggered, a daemon is summoned.
languages.original_text: Вызвав {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}угрозы варпа{/g}, персонаж получает {uip|Temp Wounds|d30eeebc490b4fdc8c26be44ffa1bf6a} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временного здоровья{/g} и не провоцирует {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g} до конца своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}. Проявлением угроз варпа всегда является призыв демона.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the wearer triggers perils of the warp, they gain +{uip|Temp Wounds|d30eeebc490b4fdc8c26be44ffa1bf6a} temporary wounds and do not provoke attacks of opportunity until the end of their turn. Whenever perils of the warp are triggered, a daemon is summoned.

Whenever the wearer triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}, they gain +{uip|Temp Wounds|d30eeebc490b4fdc8c26be44ffa1bf6a} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} and do not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Whenever perils of the warp is triggered, a daemon is summoned.

Whenever the wearer triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}, they gain +{uip|Temp Wounds|d30eeebc490b4fdc8c26be44ffa1bf6a} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} and do not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Whenever perils of the warp is triggered, a daemon is summoned.

Whenever the wearer triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}, they gain +{uip|Temp Wounds|d30eeebc490b4fdc8c26be44ffa1bf6a} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} and do not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Whenever perils of the warp is triggered, a daemon is summoned.

languages.text: Takan kişi, {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}öteboyut tehlikelerini{/g} tetiklediğinde +{uip|Temp Wounds|d30eeebc490b4fdc8c26be44ffa1bf6a} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}geçici sağlık{/g} puanı kazanır ve {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} sonuna dek {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}fırsat saldırılarını{/g} tetiklemez. Öteboyut tehlikeleri tetiklendiğinde bir iblis çağrılır.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}, they gain +{uip|Temp Wounds|d30eeebc490b4fdc8c26be44ffa1bf6a} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} and do not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Whenever perils of the warp is triggered, a daemon is summoned.

traits.locale_text: Takan kişi, {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}öteboyut tehlikelerini{/g} tetiklediğinde +{uip|Temp Wounds|d30eeebc490b4fdc8c26be44ffa1bf6a} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}geçici sağlık{/g} puanı kazanır ve {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} sonuna dek {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}fırsat saldırılarını{/g} tetiklemez. Öteboyut tehlikeleri tetiklendiğinde bir iblis çağrılır.

Takan kişi, öteboyut tehlikelerini tetiklediğinde +{uip|Temp Wounds|d30eeebc490b4fdc8c26be44ffa1bf6a} geçici sağlık puanı kazanır ve {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} sonuna dek fırsat saldırılarını tetiklemez. Öteboyut tehlikeleri tetiklendiğinde bir iblis çağrılır.

languages.text: Cada vez que el portador provoca {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}fatalidades de la disformidad{/g}, gana +{uip|Temp Wounds|d30eeebc490b4fdc8c26be44ffa1bf6a} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g} y no provoca {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g} hasta el final de su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. Cada vez que se produzcan fatalidades de la disformidad, se invoca un daemon.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}, they gain +{uip|Temp Wounds|d30eeebc490b4fdc8c26be44ffa1bf6a} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} and do not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Whenever perils of the warp is triggered, a daemon is summoned.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el portador provoca fatalidades de la disformidad, gana +{uip|Temp Wounds|d30eeebc490b4fdc8c26be44ffa1bf6a} heridas temporales y no provoca ataques de oportunidad hasta el final de su turno. Cada vez que se produzcan fatalidades de la disformidad, se invoca un daemon.

languages.text: 每当装备者触发{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}亚空间的威胁{/g}时，都会获得{uip|Temp Wounds|d30eeebc490b4fdc8c26be44ffa1bf6a}点{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}，且在{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束前不会触发{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}。每当亚空间的威胁被触发时，都会召唤一名恶魔。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}, they gain +{uip|Temp Wounds|d30eeebc490b4fdc8c26be44ffa1bf6a} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} and do not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Whenever perils of the warp is triggered, a daemon is summoned.

traits.locale_text: 每当装备者触发亚空间的威胁时，都会获得{uip|Temp Wounds|d30eeebc490b4fdc8c26be44ffa1bf6a}点临时生命值，且在回合结束前不会触发借机攻击。每当亚空间的威胁被触发时，都会召唤一名恶魔。

languages.text: Wenn der Träger "{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}Gefahren des Warp{/g}" auslöst, erhält er +{uip|Temp Wounds|d30eeebc490b4fdc8c26be44ffa1bf6a} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporäre Wunden{/g} und provoziert bis zum Ende seines {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} keine {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g}. Wird "Gefahren des Warp" ausgelöst, wird ein Dämon gerufen.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}, they gain +{uip|Temp Wounds|d30eeebc490b4fdc8c26be44ffa1bf6a} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} and do not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Whenever perils of the warp is triggered, a daemon is summoned.

traits.locale_text: Wenn der Träger "Gefahren des Warp" auslöst, erhält er +{uip|Temp Wounds|d30eeebc490b4fdc8c26be44ffa1bf6a} temporäre Wunden und provoziert bis zum Ende seines Zugs keine Gelegenheitsangriffe. Wird "Gefahren des Warp" ausgelöst, wird ein Dämon gerufen.

languages.text: Chaque fois que le porteur déclenche {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}Périls du Warp{/g}, il gagne +{uip|Temp Wounds|d30eeebc490b4fdc8c26be44ffa1bf6a} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g} et ne déclenche pas d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g} jusqu'à la fin de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}. Chaque fois que Périls du Warp est déclenché, un démon est invoqué.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}, they gain +{uip|Temp Wounds|d30eeebc490b4fdc8c26be44ffa1bf6a} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} and do not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Whenever perils of the warp is triggered, a daemon is summoned.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que le porteur déclenche Périls du Warp, il gagne +{uip|Temp Wounds|d30eeebc490b4fdc8c26be44ffa1bf6a} blessures temporaires et ne déclenche pas d'attaques d'opportunité jusqu'à la fin de son tour. Chaque fois que Périls du Warp est déclenché, un démon est invoqué.

languages.text: 使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}危険な歪み{/g}を起こすと、+{uip|Temp Wounds|d30eeebc490b4fdc8c26be44ffa1bf6a}の{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時的な傷{/g}が付与され、{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の終了まで{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を引き起こさない。危険な歪みが起きると、ディーモンが召喚される。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}, they gain +{uip|Temp Wounds|d30eeebc490b4fdc8c26be44ffa1bf6a} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} and do not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Whenever perils of the warp is triggered, a daemon is summoned.

traits.locale_text: 使用者が危険な歪みを起こすと、+{uip|Temp Wounds|d30eeebc490b4fdc8c26be44ffa1bf6a}の一時的な傷が付与され、ターンの終了まで機会攻撃を引き起こさない。危険な歪みが起きると、ディーモンが召喚される。
使用者が危険な歪みを起こすと、+{uip|Temp Wounds|d30eeebc490b4fdc8c26be44ffa1bf6a}の一時的な傷が付与され、ターンの終了まで機会攻撃を引き起こさない。危険な歪みが起きると、ディーモンが召喚される。

languages.text: Вызвав {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}угрозы варпа{/g}, персонаж получает {uip|Temp Wounds|d30eeebc490b4fdc8c26be44ffa1bf6a} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временного здоровья{/g} и не провоцирует {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g} до конца своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}. Проявлением угроз варпа всегда является призыв демона.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}, they gain +{uip|Temp Wounds|d30eeebc490b4fdc8c26be44ffa1bf6a} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} and do not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Whenever perils of the warp is triggered, a daemon is summoned.

traits.locale_text: Вызвав угрозы варпа, персонаж получает {uip|Temp Wounds|d30eeebc490b4fdc8c26be44ffa1bf6a} временного здоровья и не провоцирует атаки по возможности до конца своего хода. Проявлением угроз варпа всегда является призыв демона.

Вызвав угрозы варпа, персонаж получает {uip|Temp Wounds|d30eeebc490b4fdc8c26be44ffa1bf6a} временного здоровья и не провоцирует атаки по возможности до конца своего хода. Проявлением угроз варпа всегда является призыв демона.
